title: Meltdown Man (2010) (Digital-TPB) (DR & Quinch-Empire)
description:
Meltdown Man (2010) (Digital-TPB) (DR & Quinch-Empire)



Whilst on a mission in the Persian Gulf, SAS Sergeant Nick Stone is blasted by a nuclear explosion into the future, where the last remaining humans, such as the predatory Leeshar, rule over the eugenically-modified animal castes known as 'Yujees'. Accompanied by catgirl Liana, bullman T-Bone and loyal wolfman Gruff, Stone discovers that this bizarre world is his own - the continent he roams being South America, its poles mysteriously inverte, and is intent on ending LeesharÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dark reign by leading the slave-like Yujees in rebellion!

Featuring the incredible art of the late great Massimo Belardinelli (Ace Trucking, Flesh) and a high-octane script from Alan Hebden (Major Eazy, Death Planet).

Collects the complete 50-issue series (originally serialised in 2000AD progs 178-227)
